text: (aur kya tum vah log nahin ki) jin logon ne (hamaaree naafaramaanee karake) aap apane oopar julm kiya unheen ke gharon mein tum bhee rahe haaloki tum par ye bhee zaahir ho chuka tha ki hamane unake saath kya (baratao) kiya aur hamane (tumhaare samajhaane ke vaaste) masale bhee bayaan kar dee theen
